Personal Projects Manager
...because a wiki is good for collaborating and contributing/pooling ideas, but not good as a personal projects manager - it needs its own application
web/php based? using XML?
it must be able to show: -the project name and a few details -date of original idea -further details ---importance/urgency (priority) ------needed skills ------tasks involved ------"size" estimate ------part/total completion goals / steps -progress details ---what has been finished and when
